page.title: 13INDUSTRY
page.content: Farming is the main industry around the town of Knighton.In the town itself there are four factories.Nu- Way Benson make air heaters and ball hitches for towbars,and these products are exported to many parts of the world.Biglands experiment and make prototypes of various things.One of their big successes was making the first tractor that could pull a lifeboat out of the sea.E.Walters make trousers and jeans for many of the chainstores.They also make trousers for the army.Motorway Remoulds remould different types of good old tyres so that they can be used again on cars. There is also the Dalgetty Mill which makes animal feeds.There are a number of haulage firms in Knighton which transport goods all over the country. There are also a number of building firms.
